parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Collects all loaded [[magazines]] from all [[secondaryWeapon]] muzzles and returns them in [[Array]], otherwise it returns []. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''secondaryWeaponMagazine''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]] [[player]]; //["NLAW_F"]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_array <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]] [[player]];
[[if]] ([[count]] _array > 0) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] ("Secondary weapon is loaded with " + (_array [[select]] 0) + "!");
} [[else]] {
	[[if]] ([[secondaryWeapon]] [[player]] != "") [[then]] {
		[[hint]] "Secondary weapon is not loaded!";
	} [[else]] {
		[[hint]] "Player doesn't have a secondary weapon!";
	};
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[secondaryWeapon]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[primaryWeaponMagazine]], [[handgunMagazine]], [[binocularMagazine]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
